metadata.title: Welcome
metadata.description: Hello everyone, I am happy to finally be able to present to you:

blogPosts.content:
Hello everyone, I am happy to finally be able to present to you: [**My new website**](/). To start things off, here is an explaination what you can do on here: - Look up the [documentation](/docs/about) of all my assets for **free**. - Read the license for using the assets by clicking [here](/docs/license) - View the updates & current state of development on things [here](/blog) - Join the discord server by clicking at the logo on the top right corner. - Check my portfolio out by clicking on [this link](/portfolio) If you want to support me, you can do that [here](https://www.roblox.com/games/9635395049/Assets). That is basically it for now,
Thanks for using my products
_~ Ruixey_
